blogPost.excerpt: With LeafPile you can collect and organize your inspiration, thoughts, images, videos, and links in once place. It is simple, easy to use and best of all free!
blogPost.body: With LeafPile you can collect and organize your inspiration, thoughts, images, videos, and links in once place. It is simple, easy to use and best of all free!
blogPost.title: LeafPile - Visual bookmarking made easy.
blogPost.author: Paul Maloney

localize.description: 有了LeafPile，你可以收集和组织你的灵感，思想，图片，视频和链接在一个地方。它简单，易于使用，最重要的是免费。
localize.tagline: 可视化的书签，让你轻松实现。

localize.description: 有了LeafPile，你可以收集和組織你的靈感，思想，圖片，視頻和鏈接在一個地方。它簡單，易於使用，最重要的是免費。
localize.tagline: 可視化的書籤，讓你輕鬆實現。

previous.excerpt: MyEdu is an edu-tech firm that provides communication software solutions and apps for assisting school teachers, parents, as well as students. MyEdu's apps also help teachers in managing day-to-day activities in the most efficient way possible.
previous.title: MyEdu - School management software

localize.description: MyEdu是一家教育科技公司，提供通讯软件解决方案和应用程序，以协助学校教师、家长以及学生。MyEdu的应用程序也帮助教师以最有效的方式管理日常活动。
MyEdu是一家教育科技公司，提供通訊軟件解決方案和應用程序，以協助學校教師、家長以及學生。MyEdu的應用程序也幫助教師以最有效的方式管理日常活動。

next.excerpt: Increment.me is an easy way to get anonymous feedback about anything.
next.title: Increment - Easily get anonymous feedback on anything.

localize.tagline: 轻松获得任何事情的匿名反馈。
